sentences.sContent: I felt certain that I’d passed the test.
sentences.sCn: 我感觉自己肯定通过这次测验了。

sentences.sContent: Many people look certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.sCn: 许多人看来肯定要失业了。

sentences.sContent: ...I can definitely remember what I learned on certain days at school...

...and can do nothing about it except keep people within a certain health range...
...Every　generation develops these habits at a certain age...
...Tears can perform certain communicative functious which words cannot...
...The Distraction Addiction is particularly fascinating on how technologies have changed certain fields of labor-often for the worse...
...I don't know for certain why Carl Dadisman...
...we couldn't use certain bathrooms or try on clothes in stores...
...Only certain parts of the eye can be replaced...
...A third is certain basic chemicals such as carbon...

synos.tran: 某一；必然的；确信；无疑的；有把握的

trans.tranOther: confident and sure, without any doubts
